title: On the creation process
excerpt: How I approach building something from scratch: ideas, discipline, and sharing the journey.
content:
I wanted to write a short note on how I think about the creation process — especially when it comes to games or any long-term project.

It usually starts with an idea that won't leave. Then comes the hard part: turning that into a habit. I try to work in small steps, document as I go, and keep the scope tight so I can actually finish.

Sharing the process (here and on YouTube) keeps me accountable and helps me see the path from “early idea” to “something playable.” This article is a placeholder — you can edit articles.json and change this content to whatever you like.
